column4: do you have to do something special to use a microphone in Ubuntu?
not really; It just needs to be setup
Skype is bad like that. It uses an old audio driver.
try double clicking your audio icon in the gnome panel and set itup from there
i don't have a gnome panel :x
alsamixer in console
It took a bit of fiddling before I got mine working, but I did eventually
Nowt is.
what's wrong with GStreamer? :o
so why wouldn't it be legal? :o
Because Intellectual Property is valid in the US (and the US only)
isn't it just a media player? :o
gstreamer? No.
that's the impression i get from http://gstreamer.freedesktop.org :o
gstreamer is a set of plugins
Which allows you to play various types of restricted media
oh, i see
yeah, the MPAA probably wouldn't like that :x
Again; as long as you acquire your music legally, there's no problem with it
The EU has rejected all suggestions about Intellectual Property so far for this very reason
lucky EU :x
I know we are :)
